requirements.summary: Add password validation for Management role login during profile setup
acceptanceCriteria: ProfileSetupModal displays a password input field when Management role is selected
Password field is not shown for Student or Marketer roles
Submit button is disabled or shows error if password does not exactly match '*#Sindoor@2025'
Management users cannot complete profile setup without correct password
Error message clearly indicates incorrect password when validation fails

file_operations.description: Add password input field that appears only when Management role is selected. Implement frontend validation to check if entered password exactly matches '*#Sindoor@2025'. Disable submit button or show error message when password is incorrect for Management role. Ensure password field is hidden for Student and Marketer roles. Add clear error messaging when password validation fails.
